item.title: Keraniganj BNP leader dies after shooting
item.description: A union-level BNP leader, who was shot by miscreants on Thursday night in Keraniganj, has died after two days of hospitalisation. Hasan Mollah, general secretary of Hazratpur Union BNP, died on Saturday around 4:00 pm while receiving treatment at Holy Family Hospital, police said.

item.title: Bangladesh, India reaffirm depth of ties; stress people-centred cooperation
